overview: While California courts were putting Treasure Island Media's bareback porn on trial, Liam Cole continued to work in lawless London. The culture of man on man raw fucking is a global phenomenon and it cannot be stopped. Outlaws records Europe's reckless load-swapping, boundary-busting, bareback scene.
tagline: When a man is denied the right to live the life he believes in, he has no choice but to become an outlaw. -Nelson Mandela
title: Outlaws
